name: Chasm Hunt
description:
Set in the world of Brian Sanderson's Stormlight Archive, you have been assigned to Bridge 4--a doomed bridge crew. Today though, you simply have to go down in the ravines of the Shattered Plains and gather debris from the battles atop the plateaus. Be sure to get enough to meet the daily quota of 4,000 diamond spheres, and be back by dark...or else! 

Controls: 

Movement - WASD

Interaction - E

Attacking chulls - walk up to them
